name: Orbit | Ultimate Dance Music Remix Station
name_original: Orbit | Ultimate Dance Music Remix Station
description:
Creating great dance tracks was never easier before. Produce impressive results in no time even without any prior knowledge.

This app is a fun & creative sample machine. Play cool & hot drumbeats, cool kicks, cymbals, smashing power snares, phrases, melodies, stabs, chords, powerful synths and other sound effects. Create your own hit beats. Jam directly on your iOS device. Plug in your headphones and enjoy the sounds & music.
